content: I'm looking for some inspiration for a new art project. I've been to a lot of museums and galleries recently, and I'm thinking of combining some of the ideas I got from those visits. Speaking of which, I volunteered at the Children's Museum during their "Family Art Day" event on March 22nd, and I was there from 10 am to 4 pm. Do you have any ideas for art projects that could be suitable for kids?
